org.pmedv.actions
Class AdministrationAction

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.struts.action.Action
      org.pmedv.actions.AdministrationAction

public class AdministrationAction
extends org.apache.struts.action.Action

This is the administration action

gets all processes visible to the user and shows the administration panel.

Author:
Matthias Pueski
